scripts.test:debug: export NODE_ENV=testing && node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand
scripts.testw:debug: set NODE_ENV=testing && node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand
scripts.m:generate:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:generate ./src/migrations/initaltables
scripts.m:migrate:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:run
scripts.m:show:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:show
scripts.m:revert:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:revert
scripts.m:generate: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:generate ./src/migrations/initaltables
scripts.m:migrate: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:run
scripts.m:show: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:show
scripts.m:revert: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:revert
scripts.mw:generate:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:generate ./src/migrations/initaltables
scripts.mw:migrate:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:run
scripts.mw:show:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:show
scripts.mw:revert:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:revert
scripts.mw:generate: set NODE_ENV=production && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:generate ./src/migrations/initaltables
scripts.mw:migrate: set NODE_ENV=production && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:run
scripts.mw:show: set NODE_ENV=production && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:show
scripts.mw:revert: set NODE_ENV=production && npm run typeorm:init -- migration:revert
